item.description: From 6:30 to 7:30 PM, every Saturday and Sunday evening, the BK Learning center for peace is open to everyone wanting to deepen their meditation experiences, filling the self with peace and power to develop spiritual capacity for the challenging week ahead. Guidance and simple visual exercises that enable us to access our inner peace and strength will be offered during the meditation session. All are welcome to attend and no RSVP is needed.
item.name: Weekend Evening Meditation
